item.title: LOLOL. GF Romney/Ryan
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

[quote=“RLN, post:421, topic:463748”][quote author=Frell link=topic=567378.msg4151864#msg4151864 date=1352483289]

Obama did win because he was black

and every president before him won because they were white, I don’t see what the big deal is

That was a troll post I was trying to get Rii to click the link

But I think the most fair races are the ones where its white/white or black/black or woman/woman, otherwise you have people voting for different reasons. Yea, hard to believe for Europeans but this is America. Full of idiots.
[/quote]You actually think Obama had an advantage because he was black? Are you… serious? Black people vote overwhelmingly for democrats in the first place.

Check out the 2004 exit polls, specifically the section titled “VOTE BY RACE”:

http://www.cnn.com/ELECTION/2004/pages/results/states/US/P/00/epolls.0.html

88% voted for Kerry over Bush. I don’t understand why you think the black vote really made much of a difference in Obama’s campaign. Just wake up to the truth that people are becoming educated, information is more widely distributed, and as a result people are less likely to vote for the party promoting archaic social policy.[/quote]
We already went over how the black % of votes were different (way more) in 2008 but we concluded it wasn’t that major to have an effect

Read full topic
